name: Creation of the gala website
short_description: During this  session, i have to fulfill some desires of my teammate Julien Morvan . He wants to create two differents websites. One before the revelation of the GALA thematic and another after that. We are going to make a little quizz about the event . This quizz must be available directly from the website. So, in order to achieve this goal, i must use the JAVA language that i never heard about. it can be a good jump into my second years of academic school.
summary: This project consists ofthe creation of a decent website for the GALA
